channel.title: MESG Core v0.9.1 Release Notes
channel.description:
This small release fixes a few bugs and is the last release of the current implementation of the CLI.
- Use dedicated IPFS node instead of IPFS gateway - Improve generation of service's readme file - Better error when parsing service definition - Fix links to docs
The CLI is being redeveloped using JavaScript in order to be much more reusable for future application. You can follow its development by watching its [GitHub repo mesg-foundation/cli](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/cli).
----
For the complete changelog, refer to [Github ](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/releases/tag/v0.9.1).
To update to v0.9.1, follow the [installation process on the documentation ](https://docs.mesg.com/guide/installation.html#automatic-installation)
